mean_cn: n.烟雾，［化］气溶，烟雾剂；  adj.喷雾的，喷雾器的
mean_en: a substance (such as hair spray or medicine) that is kept in a container under pressure and that is released as a fine spray when a button is pressed
sentence: Spraying scent from this aerosol can make the room smell better.
sentence_trans: 喷点这种喷雾香气能让屋子好闻点儿。
word_etyma: aero空气，空中，航空+ sol溶胶 → 喷在空气中的溶胶n. 气溶胶；气雾剂；喷雾器；浮质 adj. 喷雾的；喷雾器的
